name: ≈ Equilibrium
description:
Equilibrium is a space odyssey disguised in an addictive puzzle game, where you have to use your creativity and logic skills to drag lines and create beautiful light symmetries.

Supported in simple rules, Equilibrium creates the perfect balance between a good adventure and a brain challenge. The goal is to match both sides of the puzzle, solving the enigma, making lines shine and disclosing mystic shapes.

After a couple of flickering neon lights unveiled, your attention will drag to an immersive sci-fi story. There is nothing better than some interstellar visual design combined with a soothing soundtrack to kill stress and embrace deep relaxation.

Ready to bring some equilibrium to our universe? Brainstorm now!

Features:
• Easy rules to learn but every level is a new challenge and every world brings something new.
• Storytelling lines between worlds and filmmaking camera angles will take you to a science fiction universe.
• Adventure mode across 200 levels and 20 immersive worlds.
• Relaxing environment and no pressure to finish it. Like space, time is also infinite in Equilibrium.
• Addictive gameplay: once you master it, you cannot stop playing.
• Soothing music, evocative visual design and immersive sci-fi atmosphere. Headphones recommended for high quality experience!
